Sept. 4, 1926 D Gateshead Contest
Gateshead Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
gateshead-contest
None
Melodious Gems
Gateshead Fell, Gateshead, County Durham Prizes - 1st £8, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest -1st Hetton, 2nd Horden. Best cornet, euphonium and trombone - Horden Colliery. 8 bands competed.
Nov. 14, 2018, 9:48 a.m. Nov. 14, 2018, 3:59 p.m.
1 BHK (UK) Horden Band Joseph Foster
2 Hetton Silver Band William Oughton
3 Blyth LNER G. J. C. Ritchie
4 Backworth Colliery Band Joseph Crawford Dyson
